docs.snippet: The global regulator of doping in sports answered a Senate committee’s inquiry this week, seeking to assure lawmakers that taxpayer money was well spent....
docs.lead_paragraph: The global regulator of doping in sports answered a Senate committee’s inquiry this week, seeking to assure lawmakers that taxpayer money was well spent.
docs.abstract: World Anti-Doping Agency, following questions about why it did not respond more aggressively to whistle-blowers' claims of government-run doping program in Russia, tells United States lawmakers that it did not have authority to investigate such accusations.

headline.main: Doping Watchdog Answers Questions From United States Senate
headline.print_headline: WADA Tells Lawmakers It Lacked ‘Clear Authority’ to Investigate Russian Sports

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

docs.snippet: The Indiana Pacers officially signed veteran free agent center Al Jefferson to a multi-year contract on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Indiana Pacers officially signed veteran free agent center Al Jefferson to a multi-year contract on Saturday.

docs.snippet: Kendall Graveman continued his string of good outings Saturday, with arguably his best start of the season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kendall Graveman continued his string of good outings Saturday, with arguably his best start of the season.

headline.main: Graveman, Vogt Lead Athletics Over Astros 3-2
headline.print_headline: Graveman, Vogt Lead Athletics Over Astros 3-2

docs.snippet: Many female golfers are enthusiastic about the chance to play at the Olympics, an opportunity met with a yawn by the men....
docs.lead_paragraph: Many female golfers are enthusiastic about the chance to play at the Olympics, an opportunity met with a yawn by the men.
docs.abstract: American golfer Gerina Piller, like most of her LPGA peers, is enthused at opportunity to represent her country at 2016 Olympics; many top male golfers have withdrawn from Rio Games for various reasons.

headline.main: Women Carry Golf’s Torch Where Men Are Reluctant to Go
headline.print_headline: Carrying the Torch for Golf Where Men Are Reluctant to Go
